title: Tokyo Café Visit
description: A tourist visits a cozy Tokyo café, orders coffee, asks about food and Wi-Fi, then pays and leaves.
cultural_notes: Many Tokyo cafés expect you to order at the counter first, then take a seat — but smaller kissaten may seat you first.
Iced vs. hot drinks are always offered, even in winter.
Japanese café staff often soften their tone with sentence endings like '～ますね' or '～ですかね' to sound friendly.
It's common to ask 'Wi-Fiありますか？' (Is there Wi-Fi?) directly; most cafés will help by showing a small card with the password.
Japanese cafés usually provide water automatically ('お水サービスです').
Leaving small change in a tip jar is not expected in Japan.

staff_enter_1.speaker: staff
staff_enter_1.ja: いらっしゃいませ〜。お一人ですか？

customer_enter_2.speaker: customer
customer_enter_2.ja: テイクアウトいいですか？

customer_enter_3.speaker: customer
customer_enter_3.ja: えっと、どうすればいいですか？
customer_enter_3.romaji: Etto, dō sureba ii desu ka?

staff_seat_ask_1.speaker: staff
staff_seat_ask_1.ja: こちらのカウンター席どうぞ〜。
staff_seat_ask_1.en: Please have a seat at the counter.

customer_sit_1.speaker: customer
customer_sit_1.ja: ありがとうございます。

staff_menu_offer_1.speaker: staff
staff_menu_offer_1.ja: はい、どうぞ。人気はカフェラテです！
staff_menu_offer_1.romaji: Hai, dōzo. Ninki wa kafe rate desu!
staff_menu_offer_1.en: Here you go. Our most popular item is the café latte!

customer_order_1.speaker: customer
customer_order_1.ja: じゃあ、そのカフェラテください。
customer_order_1.en: Then, I'll have that café latte please.

customer_order_3.speaker: customer
customer_order_3.ja: すみません、ちょっとわかりません。
customer_order_3.en: Sorry, I'm not sure what that is.

staff_recommend_1.speaker: staff
staff_recommend_1.ja: カフェラテか抹茶ラテが人気ですよ〜。
staff_recommend_1.romaji: Kafe rate ka matcha rate ga ninki desu yo~.
staff_recommend_1.en: Café latte or matcha latte are both popular!

customer_order_latte_1.speaker: customer
customer_order_latte_1.ja: じゃあ、カフェラテお願いします。

customer_order_matcha_1.speaker: customer
customer_order_matcha_1.en: I'll go with a matcha latte.

staff_hot_iced_1.speaker: staff
staff_hot_iced_1.ja: ホットとアイス、どちらにしますか？
staff_hot_iced_1.romaji: Hotto to aisu, dochira ni shimasu ka?
staff_hot_iced_1.en: Would you like it hot or iced?

customer_hot_1.speaker: customer
customer_hot_1.ja: ホットでお願いします。

customer_iced_1.speaker: customer
customer_iced_1.ja: アイスでお願いします。

staff_food_offer_1.speaker: staff
staff_food_offer_1.ja: ちなみにケーキもありますよ〜。
staff_food_offer_1.romaji: Chinami ni kēki mo arimasu yo~.
staff_food_offer_1.en: By the way, we also have cake!

customer_food_yes_1.speaker: customer
customer_food_yes_1.ja: じゃあ、チーズケーキもください。
customer_food_yes_1.en: Then, I'll take a cheesecake too.

customer_food_no_1.speaker: customer
customer_food_no_1.ja: 大丈夫です。ドリンクだけで。

customer_ask_whats_1.speaker: customer
customer_ask_whats_1.ja: どんなケーキがありますか？
customer_ask_whats_1.en: What kinds of cake do you have?

staff_cake_explain_1.speaker: staff
staff_cake_explain_1.ja: 今日はチーズケーキとガトーショコラがあります。
staff_cake_explain_1.romaji: Kyō wa chīzu kēki to gatō shokora ga arimasu.
staff_cake_explain_1.en: Today we have cheesecake and chocolate gateau.

customer_food_yes_2.speaker: customer
customer_food_yes_2.ja: じゃあチーズケーキください。
customer_food_yes_2.en: Then I'll have the cheesecake, please.

customer_food_no_2.speaker: customer
customer_food_no_2.ja: 大丈夫です、ドリンクだけで。

staff_confirm_1.speaker: staff
staff_confirm_1.ja: かしこまりました。カフェラテですね。席でお待ちください〜。
staff_confirm_1.romaji: Kashikomarimashita. Kafe rate desu ne. Seki de omachi kudasai~.
staff_confirm_1.en: Got it — one café latte. Please wait at your seat.

customer_wifi_ask_1.speaker: customer
customer_wifi_ask_1.ja: すみません、Wi-Fiありますか？
customer_wifi_ask_1.en: Excuse me, do you have Wi-Fi?

customer_thanks_1.speaker: customer
customer_thanks_1.ja: ありがとうございます！

staff_wifi_answer_1.speaker: staff
staff_wifi_answer_1.ja: ありますよ。パスワードはレシートに書いてあります〜。
staff_wifi_answer_1.romaji: Arimasu yo. Pasuwādo wa reshīto ni kaite arimasu~.
staff_wifi_answer_1.en: Yes, we do. The password's written on your receipt.

customer_wifi_confuse_1.speaker: customer
customer_wifi_confuse_1.ja: あ、どこですか？見えません。
customer_wifi_confuse_1.en: Huh? Where? I can't see it.

customer_ok_1.speaker: customer
customer_ok_1.ja: わかりました、ありがとうございます。

staff_wifi_help_1.speaker: staff
staff_wifi_help_1.ja: こちらです。小さい字ですみません〜。
staff_wifi_help_1.romaji: Kochira desu. Chiisai ji de sumimasen~.
staff_wifi_help_1.en: Right here. Sorry, it's in small print.

customer_ok_2.speaker: customer
customer_ok_2.ja: あっ、見えました！ありがとう。
customer_ok_2.en: Ah, I see it now! Thanks.

staff_serve_1.speaker: staff
staff_serve_1.ja: お待たせしました〜。カフェラテです。
staff_serve_1.en: Here you go — your café latte.

customer_react_good_1.speaker: customer
customer_react_good_1.ja: 美味しそう！いただきます。

customer_react_photo_1.speaker: customer
customer_react_photo_1.ja: 写真撮ってもいいですか？
customer_react_photo_1.romaji: Shashin totte mo ii desu ka?

staff_photo_response_1.speaker: staff
staff_photo_response_1.ja: もちろんです！ありがとうございます〜。

customer_thanks_2.speaker: customer
customer_thanks_2.ja: ありがとうございます！

staff_after_meal_1.speaker: staff
staff_after_meal_1.ja: お会計はカウンターでお願いします〜。
staff_after_meal_1.romaji: Okaikei wa kauntā de onegai shimasu~.
staff_after_meal_1.en: Please pay at the counter when you're ready.

customer_pay_later_1.speaker: customer
customer_pay_later_1.ja: わかりました。あとで行きます。

staff_total_1.speaker: staff
staff_total_1.romaji: Gōkei roppyaku gojū en ni narimasu.

customer_endthanks_1.speaker: customer
customer_endthanks_1.ja: ありがとうございました！

staff_end_farewell_1.speaker: staff
staff_end_farewell_1.ja: ありがとうございました〜！またお越しください！

customer_farewell_1.speaker: customer
customer_farewell_1.ja: ありがとうございました！またきます！

staff_takeout_1.speaker: staff
staff_takeout_1.ja: はい、テイクアウト大丈夫です。何にされますか？
staff_takeout_1.romaji: Hai, teiku auto daijōbu desu. Nani ni saremasu ka?
staff_takeout_1.en: Yes, takeout is fine. What would you like?

staff_help_choice_1.speaker: staff
staff_help_choice_1.ja: 店内でお召し上がりですか？テイクアウトですか？
staff_help_choice_1.romaji: Tennai de omeshiagari desu ka? Teiku auto desu ka?
staff_help_choice_1.en: Would you like to eat in or take out?

customer_takeout_ask_1.speaker: customer
customer_takeout_ask_1.ja: テイクアウトでお願いします。

staff_explain_drink_1.speaker: staff
staff_explain_drink_1.ja: カフェラテはコーヒーにミルクを入れたものです。
staff_explain_drink_1.romaji: Kafe rate wa kōhī ni miruku o ireta mono desu.
staff_explain_drink_1.en: Café latte is coffee with milk added.
